result.execSummary:
The defendant Terry L. Hooker #170673 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Unlawful Phone Use-Threaten w/ Obscenity [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.012(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Terry L. Hooker  #170673 in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Defendant Terry L. Hooker  #170673 in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea to single count.  State motions to withdraw the amended complaint and that motion.  Motion previously denied in Br. 2.  Court grants State's motion to amend.  Plea to Count 1.  Amended Complaint filed, however Motion to amend the Complaint was not granted.  Amended Complaint removed.  Defendant agrees and understands the plea.    No contest plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.
Count 1:
$243.00 fine/costs and $200.00 DNA surcharge, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
DNA sample ordered, unless already provided.
Paperwork handed in court.

Defendant Terry L. Hooker  #170673 in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Defendant Terry L. Hooker  #170673 in custody.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and parties state appearances.  State has filed motion to amend complaint to add second charge and DE motion to dismiss filed today.  State responds.  Atty Tsai explains his motion as to both counts/objects to the State's motion to amend.  State responds.  Court asks questions of State.  State responds.  Atty Tsai responds.  Court denies the motion to dismiss as filed.  Court addresses the proposed amended complaint.  State responds.  Atty Tsai responds.  Court suggests motion to amend adding count 2 be addressed before trial.

Defendant Terry L. Hooker appeared by video means with Attorney Sacra. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney.  Defendant will be representing himself.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date. $250.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 11, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
